name: Obsidian (itch) (JohnnyOuh, Dextroo)
description:
-CONTROLS-

PLAYER BLUE :
W A S D

PLAYER RED:
UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT

RETURN TO MENU:
ESC

-HOW TO PLAY-

Find your way through those procedurally generated dungeons and avoid being hit by enemies, stepping into traps or falling into lava pits.

Have fun and thanks for playing!
